source_id: {"data_source_description":"Ansible modules collection for PetStore API","license":"IBM","repo_name":"IBM PetStore Ansible Collections","repo_url":"https://gitlab.cagip-wca.mop.ibm/cagip-wca4al/cagip-wca-for-ansible-lightspeed/-/tree/main/use_case_4/collections/playbooks/pet_use_case/training/playbooks"}

name: pet_store_order.yml

source.data_source_description: Ansible modules collection for PetStore API

source_id: {"data_source_description":"Ansible modules collection for PetStore API","license":"IBM","repo_name":"IBM PetStore Ansible Collections","repo_url":"https://gitlab.cagip-wca.mop.ibm/cagip-wca4al/cagip-wca-for-ansible-lightspeed/-/tree/main/use_case_4/collections/playbooks/pet_use_case/training/playbooks"}
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Manage orders for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_order_id: 1
    local_pet_endpoint: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store
    
  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Get store inventory
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_inventory
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Petstore API - Place order for a pet
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.place_order  
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"
        pet_id: 1
        quantity: 1
        ship_date: "2024-07-19T12:34:56.789Z"
        status: "placed"
        complete: true

    - name: Petstore API - Get order by ID
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_order_by_id  
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost


    - name: Petstore API - Delete order by ID
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.delete_order_by_id
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"

name: pet_store_order_include.yml

source.data_source_description: Ansible modules collection for PetStore API

source_id: {"data_source_description":"Ansible modules collection for PetStore API","license":"IBM","repo_name":"IBM PetStore Ansible Collections","repo_url":"https://gitlab.cagip-wca.mop.ibm/cagip-wca4al/cagip-wca-for-ansible-lightspeed/-/tree/main/use_case_4/collections/playbooks/pet_use_case/training/playbooks"}
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Manage orders for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_order_id: 1
    local_pet_endpoint: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store
    
  tasks:
    - name: Include get store inventory role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_inventory
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Include place order for a pet role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.place_order  
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"
        pet_id: 1
        quantity: 1
        ship_date: "2024-07-19T12:34:56.789Z"
        status: "placed"
        complete: true

    - name: Include get order by ID role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_order_by_id  
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost


    - name: Include delete order by ID role
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.delete_order_by_id
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        order_id: "{{ local_order_id }}"

name: pet_store_pet.yml

source.data_source_description: Ansible modules collection for PetStore API

source_id: {"data_source_description":"Ansible modules collection for PetStore API","license":"IBM","repo_name":"IBM PetStore Ansible Collections","repo_url":"https://gitlab.cagip-wca.mop.ibm/cagip-wca4al/cagip-wca-for-ansible-lightspeed/-/tree/main/use_case_4/collections/playbooks/pet_use_case/training/playbooks"}
yaml_lines:
---

- name: Manage pets for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_pet_id: 123
    local_pet_endpoint: "https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"
    local_pet_name: "Tess"

  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Add pet
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.add_pet
      vars:
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"
        pet_name: "{{ local_pet_name }}"
        category_id: 1
        category_name: "Dogs"
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Petstore API - Find pets by status
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.find_pets_by_status
      vars:
        status: "available"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - name: Petstore API - Get pet by ID
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_pet_by_id
      vars:
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Petstore API - Delete pet by ID
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.delete_pet
      vars:
        pet_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"

name: pet_store_pet_include.yml

name: pet_store_user.yml

source.data_source_description: Ansible modules collection for PetStore API

source_id: {"data_source_description":"Ansible modules collection for PetStore API","license":"IBM","repo_name":"IBM PetStore Ansible Collections","repo_url":"https://gitlab.cagip-wca.mop.ibm/cagip-wca4al/cagip-wca-for-ansible-lightspeed/-/tree/main/use_case_4/collections/playbooks/pet_use_case/training/playbooks"}
yaml_lines:
---
- name: Manage users for Petstore using petstore API from https://petstore.swagger.io/
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    local_user_id: 1
    local_pet_endpoint: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user

  tasks:
    - name: Petstore API - Create user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.create_user
      vars:
          user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
          user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
          username: "johndoe"
          first_name: "John"
          last_name: "Doe"
          email: "john.doe@example.com"
          password: "password123"
          phone: "123-456-7890"
          user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Update user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.update_user
      vars:
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
        username: "johndoe"
        first_name: "John"
        last_name: "Doe"
        email: "john.doe@example.com"
        password: "newpassword123"
        phone: "987-654-3210"
        user_status: 1

    - name: Petstore API - Get user by username
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.get_user_by_username
      vars:
        username: "johndoe"
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"

    - pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Petstore API - Delete user by username
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.delete_user_by_username
      vars:
        user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
        username: "johndoe"

name: pet_store_user_include.yml

annotations.module.examples:
- name: Pause for 5 minutes to build app cache
  ansible.builtin.pause:
    minutes: 5

- name: Pause until you can verify updates to an application were successful
  ansible.builtin.pause:

- name: A helpful reminder of what to look out for post-update
  ansible.builtin.pause:
    prompt: "Make sure org.foo.FooOverload exception is not present"

- name: Pause to get some sensitive input
  ansible.builtin.pause:
    prompt: "Enter a secret"
    echo: no

yaml_lines:
- pause:
        prompt: "Do you want to continue(yes/no)?"
      register: my_pause
      delegate_to: localhost

options.name: Petstore API - Add pet

yaml_lines:
- name: Petstore API - Add pet
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.add_pet
      vars:
        pet_id: "{{ local_pet_id }}"
        pet_name: "{{ local_pet_name }}"
        category_id: 1

yaml_lines:
- name: Petstore API - Create user
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: ibm.ce_emea_petstore.create_user
      vars:
          user_endpoint: "{{ local_pet_endpoint }}"
          user_id: "{{ local_user_id }}"
          username: "johndoe"
          first_name: "John"
          last_name: "Doe"
          email: "john.doe@example.com"
          password: "password123"
          phone: "123-456-7890"
          user_status: 1
